title: A Raisin in the Sun Asagais remark

content.question: Asagai’s remark to Beneatha, “That will be the problem for another time” (line 22), conveys which of the following perspectives?

choices.label: Global emergencies have no easy solution.
Large issues may be tackled in small stages.

content.answer: Large issues may be tackled in small stages.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
